{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$15.5M in 2021-2022** on contracts with WPP GROUP CANADA COMMUNICATIONS.

Across 64 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 12 have at least one amendment (19%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 21% and the average number of amendments was 1.33. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$2.7M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.56 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$328.6K. The longest contract was 1.85 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$8.1M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
